Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Fields
  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    com.clover.sdk.v3.order.IOrderService
    Please use the IOrderServiceV3_1 via OrderConnector instead, it offers all the same functionality but is designed to handle large orders (over 1MB) that cause this API to fail. New methods may not be added to this class going forward.
    com.clover.sdk.ValueExtractorEnum
    Replaced by ExtractionStrategy.
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    com.clover.sdk.internal.util.UnstableCallClient
    Use UnstableContentResolverClient.call(String, String, Bundle, Bundle) instead.
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.CashDrawer
    This class interacts with cash drawers that are connected via configured Clover printers. For a more generalized API for working with cash drawers, please use CashDrawers.
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.job.ImagePrintJob
    Use ImagePrintJob2. This class writes files into external storage that are not cleaned up and can eventually exhaust the device's storage.
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.PrinterConnector.PrinterCallback
    com.clover.sdk.v3.billing.DeviceCountInfo
    This is a Clover private internal use class and should not be used. There are no connectors available to get this data from Clover services.
    com.clover.sdk.v3.billing.DevicePriceInfo
    This is a Clover private internal use class and should not be used. There are no connectors available to get this data from Clover services.
    com.clover.sdk.v3.order.OrderContract.Summaries
    OrderContract.OrderSummary replaces this. This contract is much slower and contains only data that the user of the device has actually interacted with in the last 7 days.
    com.clover.sdk.v3.order.OrderV3Connector
    Please use the OrderConnector instead, it offers all the same functionality but is designed to handle large orders (over 1MB) that cause this API to fail. New methods may not be added to this class going forward.
    com.clover.sdk.v3.payments.ReceiptInfo
  • Fields 
    Field Description
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.allowOfflinePayment
    please use TransactionSettings.getAllowOfflinePayment()
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.approveOfflinePaymentWithoutPrompt
    please use TransactionSettings.getApproveOfflinePaymentWithoutPrompt()
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.cardEntryMethods
    Please use TransactionSettings.getCardEntryMethods()
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.disableRestartTransactionWhenFailed
    please use TransactionSettings.getDisableRestartTransactionOnFailure()
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.isDisableCashBack
    Please use TransactionSettings.getDisableCashBack()
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.isForceSwipePinEntry
    please use TransactionSettings.getForcePinEntryOnSwipe()
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.remotePrint
    Please use TransactionSettings.getCloverShouldHandleReceipts() NOTE - The boolean value for setCloverShouldHandleReceipts is the inverse of remotePrint (i.e. remotePrint == true is the equivalent of TransactionSettings.getCloverShouldHandleReceipts() == false)
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.requiresRemoteConfirmation
    please use TransactionSettings.getRemoteConfirmationRequired()
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.tippableAmount
    Please use TransactionSettings.getTippableAmount()
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.transactionNo
    , generated internally in the SPS/SPA
    com.clover.sdk.util.CustomerMode.WINDOW_FEATURE_CUSTOMER_MODE
    com.clover.sdk.util.CustomerMode.WINDOW_FEATURE_NO_CUSTOMER_MODE
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_BILL_SPLIT  
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_GIFT_CARD_TX  
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_MANUAL_PAY
    Please use Intents.ACTION_CLOVER_PAY instead
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_MANUAL_REFUND
    Please use Intents.ACTION_CLOVER_PAY instead
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_PAY
    Replaced by Intents.ACTION_MERCHANT_TENDER and Intents.ACTION_CUSTOMER_TENDER
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_REQUEST_ROLE
    Use Intents.ACTION_AUTHENTICATE_EMPLOYEE with Intents.EXTRA_ACCOUNT_ROLES.
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_SCAN
    This does not work on recent devices. Use BarcodeScanner instead.

    Broadcast to start barcode scanner service on Station or Mini (Mobile scanner must be activated via physical trigger)

    Extras passed:

    • Intents.EXTRA_START_SCAN - true will start scanner, false will close scanner (Required)
    • Intents.EXTRA_SHOW_PREVIEW - whether scanner preview video will be shown, default is true. The preview window cannot be hidden on Clover Flex 1 (C401) devices.
    • Intents.EXTRA_SHOW_MERCHANT_PREVIEW - whether scanner preview will be shown in merchant facing mode, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_SHOW_CUSTOMER_PREVIEW - whether scanner preview will be shown in customer facing mode, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_LED_ON - whether LED will be on (selected devices only), default is false
    • Intents.EXTRA_SCAN_QR_CODE - whether QR codes will be scanned, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_SCAN_1D_CODE - whether 1D codes will be scanned, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_SHOW_CLOSE_BUTTON - whether scanner preview will have a 'close' button, default is true
    • Intents.EXTRA_SHOW_LED_BUTTON - whether scanner preview will have an LED toggle, default is true
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.ACTION_STORE_CREDIT  
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.EXTRA_APP  
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.EXTRA_AVAILABLE  
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.EXTRA_DIALOG  
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.EXTRA_IS_TESTING  
    com.clover.sdk.v1.Intents.EXTRA_TRANSACTION_NO
    , internally in the SPS/SPA
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.job.PrintJob.FLAG_SALE
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.job.PrintJob.printToAny
    Use PrintJobsConnector.print(PrintJob) to print to any suitable configured printer. This field is ignored when calling PrintJobsConnector.print(PrintJob) or PrintJobsConnector.print(Printer, PrintJob).
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.PrinterIntent.ACTION_OPEN_CASH_DRAWER_SERVICE
    Use CashDrawers instead.
    com.clover.sdk.v1.tender.TenderIntent.ACTION_MERCHANT_CHANGED  
    com.clover.sdk.v3.cash.CashContract.CashEventColumns.TOTAL
    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.InventoryContract.ItemColumns.COUNT
    Use InventoryContract.ItemStockColumns.QUANTITY instead. Count of items in stock.

    Type: INTEGER
    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.InventoryContract.ItemColumns.TAXABLE

    Method Description
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.allowOfflinePayment​(Boolean)
    Please use TransactionSettings.setAllowOfflinePayment(Boolean)
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.approveOfflinePaymentWithoutPrompt​(Boolean)
    Please use TransactionSettings.setApproveOfflinePaymentWithoutPrompt(Boolean)
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.cardEntryMethods​(int)
    Please use TransactionSettings.setCardEntryMethods(Integer)
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.disableCashback​(boolean)
    Please use TransactionSettings.setDisableCashBack(Boolean)
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.disableRestartTransactionWhenFailed​(boolean)
    Please use TransactionSettings.setDisableRestartTransactionOnFailure(Boolean)

    Please use TransactionSettings.setForcePinEntryOnSwipe(Boolean)
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.originatingTransaction​(CardTransaction)
    pass originatingPayment instead, originating tx will be auto-populated from the payment card tx
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.remotePrint​(boolean)
    Please use TransactionSettings.setCloverShouldHandleReceipts(Boolean) NOTE - The boolean value for setCloverShouldHandleReceipts is the inverse of remotePrint (i.e. remotePrint(true) is the equivalent of TransactionSettings.setCloverShouldHandleReceipts(false))
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.requiresRemoteConfirmation​(Boolean)
    Please use TransactionSettings.setRemoteConfirmationRequired(Boolean)
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.testing​(boolean)
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.tippableAmount​(long)
    Please use TransactionSettings.setTippableAmount(Long)
    com.clover.common2.payments.PayIntent.Builder.transactionNo​(String)
    , generated internally in the SPS/SPA
    com.clover.sdk.GenericClient.validateLength​(String, long)
    Use GenericClient.validateLength(ExtractableEnum, String, long) instead.
    com.clover.sdk.GenericClient.validateNull​(T, String)
    Use GenericClient.validateNotNull(ExtractableEnum, Object) instead
    com.clover.sdk.util.CloverAccount.getAccounts​(Context)
    Use CloverAccount.getAccount(Context) instead. Very early versions of Clover software supported multiple Clover Accounts on a single device, but this is no longer the case, there is now always a single Clover Account on each device.
    com.clover.sdk.util.CloverAuth.authenticate​(Activity, Account, boolean)
    Use CloverAuth.authenticate(Context, boolean, Long, TimeUnit) (required when targeting SDK level 26 or higher)
    com.clover.sdk.util.CustomerMode.disable​(Context)
    com.clover.sdk.util.CustomerMode.enable​(Context)
    com.clover.sdk.util.CustomerMode.getState​(Context)
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.CashDrawer.open​(Context, Account)
    Prefer interacting with cash drawers via CashDrawers
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.CashDrawer.open2​(Context, Account)
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.job.PrintJob.Builder.flags​(int)
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.job.PrintJob.Builder.printToAny​(boolean)
    Use PrintJobsConnector.print(PrintJob) to print to any suitable configured printer. This field is ignored when calling PrintJobsConnector.print(PrintJob) or PrintJobsConnector.print(Printer, PrintJob).
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.job.PrintJob.print​(Context, Account)
    Use PrintJobsConnector.print(PrintJob). This method provides no mechanism to understand success or failure, and no way to retrieve the status of the print job.
    com.clover.sdk.v1.printer.job.ViewPrintJob.Builder.view​(View)
    Prefer ViewPrintJob.Builder.view(View, int) since it ensures the View is laid out and measured.

    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.IInventoryService.Default.getItemIds​(ResultStatus)
    See note on {@link #getItems(ResultStatus).
    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.IInventoryService.Default.getItems​(ResultStatus)
    Many merchants have a large inventory of items that cannot be retrieved in a single shot due to binder and memory limits. As a precaution always use the InventoryContract to retrieve the entire set of inventory items.

    This method will return a maximum of 500 items before returning a fault.
    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.IInventoryService.Default.getItemsWithCategories​(ResultStatus)
    See note on {@link #getItems(ResultStatus).
    com.clover.sdk.v3.inventory.IInventoryService.getItemIds​(ResultStatus)

    Many merchants have a large inventory of items that cannot be retrieved in a single shot due to binder and memory limits. As a precaution always use the InventoryContract to retrieve the entire set of inventory items.

    This method will return a maximum of 500 items before returning a fault.
